name: Cover Your Coughs: How To Social Interaction
name_original: Cover Your Coughs: How To Social Interaction
description:
LIP MOVEMENT IS OFF-SYNC ON WEBGL BUILD !!! download mac/windows version for full experience (coming soon) very broken game, enjoy at your own risk.

You run into an old friend who can’t stop rambling about Enchilada Tuesday. BUT a cough starts to build up, and the last thing you want is for him to catch you coughing! Time your toots and conceal your coughs!

Controls:

Drag the left mouse button to move the camera

Press spacebar to time your farts

Right click on your friend’s features to animate them

Enjoy!

On a side note, I explore ray-casting triggering animation controllers with the interactive face controls!
